Fixed-line broadband.name: F09.01
Fixed-line broadband.description: Does the company clearly disclose a policy commitment to not prioritize, block, or delay certain types of traffic, applications, protocols, or content for reasons beyond assuring quality of service and reliability of the network?

Fixed-line broadband.name: F09.02
Fixed-line broadband.description: Does the company engage in practices, such as offering zero-rating programs, that prioritize network traffic for reasons beyond assuring quality of service and reliability of the network?

Fixed-line broadband.name: F09.03
Fixed-line broadband.description: If the company does engage in network prioritization practices beyond assuring quality of service and reliability of the network, does it clearly disclose its purpose for doing so?
